duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage design projects from conception to completion.
Work closely with creative and account teams to ensure the highest quality of design output across multiple channels, including print, digital, and experiential.
Mentor and develop junior designers on the team.
Bring fresh and innovative ideas to the table and think beyond the expected solutions.
Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams including creative, account, and strategy teams.
Take and provide feedback to ensure the best final product.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years of experience in a design agency or in-house creative team.
